message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, reflecting its unique qualities and craftsmanship. Considering its worth to you, I am extending this offer at a price of $12000. I believe this proposition strikes a fair balance between the value I place on the product and the benefit it would bring to you. Should you find this proposal agreeable, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction. Thank you for considering this offer.
